findings.title: Tautology or contradiction
findings.description: The code contains a tautology or contradiction, which can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Return values of low-level calls
findings.description: The audit report highlights the potential risk of ignoring return values from low-level calls, which can lead to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Missing Zero Address Validation
findings.description: The contract does not validate if an address is zero before performing operations, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Using SHA3
findings.description: The audit report flags the usage of SHA3 as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: A.1 Floating Solidity Version (pragma solidity ^0.8.11)
findings.description: The contract has a floating solidity pragma version. Locking the pragma helps to ensure that making the contract use a stable solidity pragma version prevents bugs occurrence that could be ushered in by prospective versions.
